alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; New Hanover; Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 4:24PM EDT until August 27 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern New Hanover County in southeastern North Carolina... Pender County in southeastern North Carolina... Northeastern Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 424 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from White Stocking to The Borough, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Leland, Burgaw, Northwest, Point Caswell, Maple Hill, Long Creek, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Ashton, Rocky Point, Currie, Castle Hayne, Wards Corner, The Borough, Phoenix, White Stocking, Murray Town, Wrightsboro, Montague, Rooks, and Malpass Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
